page.title: 15LIFE STYLES.
page.content: This was a typical day of Ming Ng.I wake up at 7.30 a.m. and have a wash. I get dressed and go downstairs to have have my breakfast.By this time it is 7.30 a.m.I wash up my dishes and put them away.I watch T.V. for a while and then I get ready for school. It is now 8.05 a.m.Then I leave my house at 8.10 a.m.I arrive at school about 8.30 a.m.Then we have the register.The morning lessons starts at 9.05 a.m.and finishes at 10.30 a.m.and it's breaktime.This finishes at 10.50 and during this time we can play.After this lessons start again and finish at 12.00p.m.Now it is dinner-time for 1 hour.We can either eat at school or go home.I usually have a portion of chips.Afternoon lessons starts at 1.05 p.m.and finish at 3.30 p.m.I arrive home and have my tea.Then I get changed and play until 9.00 p.m.(Con.)
